hero.subline: Training Manager & Problem Solving Coach with experience in SWE, Networking, and Education.

coach.name: Ahmed Ashraf Abdelazez Sabry
coach.university: Thebes Academy, B.S. in Electronics and Communication Engineering (2018–2023)
achievements: Participated in Google Code Jam & Meta Hacker Cup
projects: PST.community — online platform for problem solvers
Training frameworks & systems for Coach Academy
Authored educational content adopted in universities

items.q: How to request this coach for corporate training?
items.a: Use the WhatsApp button to share your requirements. We will coordinate schedules and program details.

items.q: What subjects can the coach cover?
items.a: Competitive Programming, SWE, Networking, IoT, Problem Solving, Python, Circuits, PLC and more.

items.q: Does the coach teach school students?
items.a: Yes. Experience with school, university, and graduates segments.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
footer.address: 72B ElManial St, ElManial ElGharby, Cairo, Egypt
